inn1.comm: and runs first up, as Sreesanth charges in and pitches down leg side, thats a wide to get Australia on the board
better stuff, back of a length on off stump and Gilchrist defends to point
tight stuff, good length on off stump and he pushes to cover this time

oh thats unlucky! Sreesanth pitches much fuller and gets it to swing in, Gilchrist is stuck to his crease as he drives and gets the thickest of inside-edges back onto his pads but umpire Koertzen doesn't pick it, instead slowly raising his finger to uphold Sreesanth's aggressive appeal and India have struck in the first over
back of a length and lifting outside off, Ponting gets in and leaves
good length, bringing Ponting forward on the defensive to cover
beaten! This one moves away off a length and Ponting pushes down the wrong line ... good ball to end the over
and he fires one very wide of the stumps, and he's overstepped
this one angles across him, fairly wide, and Hayden cannot get there
this one as well, angled very wide across Hayden's stumps and he leaves
edged and dropped! Hayden pushes at one angling away this time and the ball flies off the outside edge but Uthappa at third slip cannot hold on after getting fingertips to it
this one too is very wide of the stumps and Hayden can't get there
width again but no timing from Hayden, who plays it back to Ishant
tight delivery, hitting an off-stump length and coming back in this time, Hayden getting in line and playing it back to Ishant
back to the wider length, angling across, and Hayden leaves it be
back of a length delivery outside off, good carry too as Ponting leaves
a firm push to a fuller one outside off stump, though not perfectly timed, gets Ponting off the mark, just squirting the gap at cover
he drives off the front foot again, this time uppishly and streakily through the gap at backward point, to a slightly wider one
good length just outside off stump, he drives it to extra cover
top shot, a typical Hayden shot to a gift-wrapped half-volley, driven firmly on the up through a diving extra cover
same stuff, driven harder this time and thats why he couldn't beat mid-off
full on off stump, bit of swing, Ponting shuffles across and drives, mistiming the shot to midwicket but calling for the one immediately
wow, thats a shot, just a full face of the bat to another overpitched delivery and the ball races away back past the stumps and mid-off
back of a length, comes back in, pushes into the cover and sets off, and he comes back for the second after an overthrow from Sehwag at mid-off
back of a length, moving away, good carry, Hayden shoulders arms
edged for four, as Hayden drives hard at a no-ball and gets another thick outside edge well over a leaping second slip ... Ishant's over-stepping woes continue
another no-ball! Ishant bowls a decent delivery, slower and full on the stumps and Hayden can only drive it back to him ... but this is ridiculous
and he connects, swinging one across from off stump and beating mid-on
overpitched outside off stump, he drives to extra cover for one
full on off stump, drives it back between Sreesanth's legs for a single
short of a length but too straight and he tucks it around the corner for one
good length outside off and he pushes to extra cover, Gambhir collects and has a throw but misses and Harbhajan fumbles at midwicket
full on the pads and he flicks that out to deep backward square
good length on off stump, Ponting gets in line and plays it back
short one down the stumps, Ponting ducks and wide is not called
tries to flick, gets rapped on the pads, outside the line
and he gets his man, pitching on a good length and just wide of off stump, Hayden goes for a big drive and gets a thin edge to Dhoni
thats full and wide down the pads and Clarke can't get bat on it
gets forward and drives a good length ball to Gambhir at cover
fractionally overpitched on the stumps and Clarke taps it back down the pitch, awkward bounce beats Ishant and Sehwag dives to haul it back in on the ropes
gets forward to a good length one and pushes into the gap at cover-point, really leaning into that one and then running hard for three
thats a better length, getting Clarke to defend off the front foot
full on the pads and he turns it to square leg for one
good length on off stump, Clarke gets forward and defends to cover
too straight and he gets back to turn it to midwicket for a brace
tad slower, he drives hard and mistimes it to mid-off, who dives to stop
straight again, he gets back and works it to Rohit at square leg
back of a length on off stump, Clarke gets in line and defends
back of a length on off stump, good lift, he gets back and defends

edged and gone! Ishant wins the battle again! Its that same, nagging, back of a length delivery outside off stump that gets Ponting up and pushing at it, undone by the extra bounce, and presenting an easy catch into slip's lap
back of a length outside off stump, Symonds shoulders arms
back of a length again, seaming back in, Symonds gets back and uses the soft hands to pick up a sharp single in front of point
much fuller and he gets to the pitch, driving into the covers
short and a tad too wide, Clarke gets over it and cuts to backward point
straight on the stumps and he shuffles across, working one to midwicket
good bounce, fairly nipping up off a length and getting Symonds airborne, doing well to keep the bat down
shorter one, over Symonds' left shoulder, and Koertzen calls it wide
short of a length on the stumps, he gets up and keeps it down to square leg
slower ball, back of a length and wide enough for him to leave, a fumble allows one
back of a length outside off stump, he gets back and defends
back of a length, coming in, Clarke watchfully defends to cover
back of a length outside off stump, he opts to leave it be
fuller one on the stumps, he shuffles and nudges a quick run to midwicket
back of a length again, getting Clarke shouldering arms this time
touch wider but still on that same channel and Clarke leaves again
good follow-up ball, attempted yorker and Clarke squeezes it to point
good-length ball and Clarke gets right over it, bat and pad married, to defend
fraction short and Symonds brings the bat down hard over it, very close to the body but he does well to chop it through gully for one to third man
thats rubbish, drifting onto the pads and Clarke helps it to fine leg
full on the pads, flicked to Rohit at short midwicket, Symonds is out of his crease and the fielder has a direct hit but bat is just grounded, good effort
again on leg stump, Clarke mistimes his shot back to Pathan
thats the area, hitting a length and angling it away from Clarke, who flirts from the crease and misses
back to a full length, Clarke drives well but straight to Harbhajan at cover
fractionally overpitched and Symonds picks his gap superbly, driving from the crease and piercing extra cover
shorter one, he gets up and over it, dabbing through gully for one
good length but too straight, Clarke shuffles and works it to midwicket
good shot, a firm straight drive that hits the stumps at the other end
good length and wide, bit of movement away, Clarke sizes it up and leaves be
drives a good-length ball hard but cannot beat the man at cover
good length outside off, he initially thinks about playing and then pulls back but the ball kisses his twirling bat and bounces to slip
back of a length on off stump, no width, he gets back and defends
good length on off stump, he inches forward and then defends to point
thats a touch shot, Symonds pushing a length ball at mid-off and running
sharp catch! Clarke throws it away, coming down and clipping the ball to midwicket, where Rohit holds it very well and Australia are four down
off the mark immediately, driving a fullish delivery through gully for one
short of a length outside off, good carry, Hussey shoulders arms
back of a length on the stumps, defended to the fielder in the ring, 'NO!' is the call
pitches outside leg, Hussey gets up and defends, again saying no to Symonds
but this time he wants one, turning the ball wide of Rohit at square leg
sits up nicely, getting Symonds up on his toes, he keeps it down to gully
good ball, fuller and moving away from an uncertain Hussey, who doesn't completely cover his off stump as he shoulders arms
pitches outside leg on a length, Symonds turns it out to deep backward
back of a length and inviting the drive, but Hussey refrains
this one's closer to the stumps and coming in, again its left alone
wrong line, sliding down leg stump and called wide
back of a length again, he gets up and leaves it be once more
gets some width and cuts this late, through backward point, for one
pitches on leg stump, he gets up and works it to midwicket
short of a length outside leg, goes away and Hussey hops to defend
sharp carry there, as Hussey leaves one angled across him off a length
slower one, on a good length, gets Hussey coming forward to defend
good length, pitches on leg and moves across, Hussey defends it back
good length, just outside off stump, he gets across and leaves
back of a length on off stump, he hurriedly defends it to Ishant
good length outside off, Symonds comes forward and pushes to cover
gets some width and drives hard, a bump ball to a diving cover fielder
back of a length outside off, he opens the face and runs it to gully
hits a length and comes in, he gets across and turns it to leg
shorter one outside leg, turned off the hips to short fine leg for one
pitches outside off and comes in sharply as Hussey leaves it be
good length outside off stump, he leans into a drive towards cover
back of a length, extra zip, Hussey gets up and keeps it down to point, then runs hard
sits up again, but Symonds gets over it and late-cuts to gully
short of a length, good lift from Ishant, Symonds gets up and defends

gone! Ishant again works that outside-the-off-stump line, getting it to lift sharply again and hold its line and straighten, for Symonds to nibble an edge that Dhoni takes, initially moving away but then diving to his right
short of a length and lifting further, Haddin gets across and shoulders arms
short of a length on middle and leg, he gets up and tucks it to midwicket
back of a length, angled across, Haddin gets across and defends
bit shorter this time but with no room to work with, Haddin defends off the back foot, making sure to get right in line with the ball
and again, back of a length and Haddin defends off the back foot
fuller one now, swinging back in from off stump, driven over Pathan for one
strays down the leg stumps and Hussey tucks it to backward square leg
short of a length outside leg, Hussey gloves it away off the ribs for one
back of a length outside off and Haddin gets over it well, defending to point
good length outside off, Haddin drives to extra cover this time
back of a length, tidy line once again, and he defends it to point
gets back and tucks this one to square leg, just not wide of the fielder
hits that excellent length again and pushes him back, defending
back of a length outside off stump, Hussey leaves it be
128ks, again that similar line and length and he leaves be
132.5ks, slides down the pads and he helps it down to fine leg
fuller one, drawing a thick inside-edge as Haddin drives from the crease
thats outside leg stump and turned through square leg for a well-run couple, as the fielder was pretty much right back on the boundary
back of a length this time, and Haddin watchfully defends to point
tossed up on the stumps, he gets across and nudges one to midwicket

tossed up on leg stump, played off the pads, the ball balloons up in the air, there's calls of catch it, catch it and short leg does, but umpire Taufel gets the call right, there was absolutely no bat involved
tossed up on middle and off, he presses forward and defends
tossed up again, getting Haddin to come forward and defend
drifts onto middle and leg and its defensively turned to midwicket
slightly flatter delivery outside off, Haddin gets over it and defends
tossed up a fraction short, he gets back and punches into the covers
well flighted, good rotation on that one, Haddin defends it back
flatter one, pushing Haddin back, driving to a sharp Rohit at mid-on
quick and flat again, Haddin gets back and drives to Rohit again
there's some width and Haddin dabs it towards gully for a quick single
keeps it quick and flat on off stump and Hussey drives to extra cover
that not really short but Hussey pulls from outside off to deep midwicket
flat down leg stump, he gets back and flicks to the fielder under the helmet
tossed up on middle and leg, very flat, and its pushed back down the track
flatter still, Haddin gets forward and defends
now there's some flight, as he tosses it up on a length, it spins on and beats the bat, Dhoni whips off the bails but the umpire is not interested
back to quick and flat, getting Haddin onto the front foot, driving to point
tossed up on off stump, hint of turn, Hussey gets in line and drives to cover
marginally short in length, and he gets back to drive out to deep cover
gives it some air, Haddin uses his feet and drives back to Sehwag
uses his feet again, to a flighted delivery, and clips wide of mid-on
drifts onto leg stump, well turned into the gap at backward square leg and Hussey initiated the second with some excellent running
flatter delivery, middle and leg, defended to the man at midwicket
tossed up on a length, 80ks, he gets forward and pats it back
tossed up on middle and leg, defended to short leg

now thats some good glovework! Haddin falls over as he attempts to slog-sweep one drifting down leg stump, but he misses and in a flash Dhoni whips off the bails, effecting a very good leg-side stumping ... Haddin doesn't wait for the referral
full and flat, getting Lee to come forward and defend it back
flighted this time, middle and leg, defended to short leg
quicker one, off a length, gets Lee back in the crease, defending
tosses it up again, this time Lee smothers the spin completely
tossed up a bit wide, cut through where slips would've been, for a single
bit flat and short, Hussey gets back and punches into the covers
tossed up on off stump, bit of turn, but Lee plays it back to Sehwag
quick and flat, he gets over it and defends watchfully
spins down leg stump and Lee plays a neat paddle sweep into the yawning gap behind square, runs hard, and gets two
spins down again, leg stump, he sweeps again for a quick single
quicker one as he sees him coming, Lee adjusts and defends to point
thats a good shout, as its fired in flat and catches Lee low on the front leg in front of the stumps, they all go up in appeal but Taufel is unmoved ... perhaps a bit of inside-edge there
tossed up on the stumps, he gets forward and drives to cover
flat again, middle and off, he gets in line and defends
this one's got some air on it, Lee gets forward and plays it away
slides down leg stump, Lee misses the sweep, they all appeal but that pitched outside the line and was carrying down further
tossed up on off stump, watchfully defended by Hussey
flatter one on leg stump, worked across towards midwicket, but not past him
this time he uses his feet and drives to extra cover for a quick single
spins down leg stump, no bat on that one, Sehwag appeals in vain
gets down and paddles one fine, raising Australia's 100 in the 29th over
ends the over with a single, dabbing a quick and flat one to point
tossed up on off stump, he gets half-forward and defends to point
tossed up, comes on with the angle, defended watchfully again
slower, flatter one down leg stump, worked to midwicket
thats the faster one, 96ks, pushing him back in the crease
tossed up outside off, getting Hussey over it in defence
quick again, and flatter, so Hussey plays it watchfully to point
comes down the track, Sehwag bowls it flat, Lee drives hard to cover
again, uses his feet and goes straighter this time, picking up one to long-off
finally Hussey gets a boundary, rocking back and pulling a short one over midwicket, one, two, three bounces and over the ropes
quicker, flatter one outside off stump, Hussey pushes to point
bit of width outside off and he cracks it past point for a couple
tossed up on off stump, Hussey picks the length and gets back, driving into the covers to keep hold of the strike
sees the width and frees the arms, cutting past backward point
tossed up on leg stump, played off the pads to forward short leg
tossed up on off stump, Lee stretches forward and defends
slides down leg stump and he paddles it out to Pathan at fine leg
tossed up on a length, 82ks, he gets across and works it to midwicket
much quicker and flatter down leg stump, speared in and catches Lee on the boot but Taufel turns down a half-hearted appeal
tossed up on the stumps, he shuffles and works it to midwicket
tossed up on a length, he waits for the turn and plays it to point
very quick and flat outside leg stump, takes the boot and he scampers a run
bang, thats four, as Hussey slaps a short ball hard over midwicket, one bounce just inside the ropes, well struck
slower one, kept full on the stumps and he clips it to midwicket
still a bit too short, Hussey works it into the gap at square leg to keep strike
tossed up wide of off stump, he has a look-see and leaves it alone
too short and wide and its duly cut out to deep point for a single
tossed up on off stump, spins away, Lee pokes to point but cant beat hin
slips down leg stump, Lee does a complete 360 in an attempt to paddle it, no contact but its called wide and Dhoni cannot take it cleanly
tossed up on a length, Hussey patiently nudges into the offside for one
tossed up, Lee gets back and defends it to cover
gets a short one but cannot cut it away, instead playing it to gully but Hussey won't mind, as he will regain strike
spins down leg stump, nudged into the gap for a single
tossed up on leg stump, Lee advances and drives to midwicket
spins on from middle and off, Hussey heaves it down to deep square leg
tossed up on the stumps, he gets over it and gently eases into the gap
flatter one on off stump, bringing Lee forward to smother the spin
misses his paddle to one down leg, bowler and 'keeper appeal, umpire unmoved
tossed up gently outside off stump, Hussey judges it and prefers to leave
deft touch, Hussey reaching across and paddling one from out in front of his front pad, picking the vacancy at short fine leg and the ball runs away
pitches wide and he gets back, cutting through backward point for two
tosses it up, 81.5ks, he waits for the spin and runs it fine for one
spins away, off a length, Lee gets across and pushes to point for one
gets across and dabs a good-length ball wide of gully for a single that raises a very good fifty
poor ball first up, wide of the stumps and duly called so
good length ball on middle and off, Hussey gets back and defends to Pathan
slides down leg stump, he tries to nudge it but the ball runs off his pads and Pathan runs in and fields
cuts a short one into the covers but cannot beat Raina, the substitute
fuller ball, bit of movement through the air, pushed into the covers for one
short ball over off stump, Lee takes his eyes off the ball but does move the head out of harm's way as the ball flies past him
fuller ball, Lee uses his feet and drives that to extra cover
slides down leg stump and Hussey sweeps it fine for a single
looped up on leg stump, spins away and Lee nudges to midwicket
quicker, flatter, fuller and Hussey inside-edges back onto his feet
spins down leg stump and Hussey kneels down, sweeping into the gap and that single brings up the 50-run partnership, a top-class effort
now he too paddles one from middle and leg into the gap
slips down the pads and its run into the gap to get Hussey back on strike
flicks a reverse-swinging delivery from middle stump to mid-on, runs hard
and he snaps a threatening partnership, changing his length and pace to get Lee feathering a catch into Dhoni's gloves, off a loose drive
full and swinging, Johnson reads it and plonks bat down on it
sharp one, softening Johnson up as the ball jags into him but its well defended down towards gully
good ball, back of a length but equally well played, just gently defended to point and they set off
good drive, getting to the pitch and piercing cover, then running hard for two
tossed up on a length, he gets forward and defends to point
tossed up again, he gets forward again but cannot beat cover
thats the 150, as Hussey advances and drives towards extra cover
quicker, flatter on off stump, Johnson gets up and drives to cover
tossed up again, Johnson waits and then drives to point
this one spins the other way as he covers off stump and leaves
back of a length on off stump, he gets back and plays to midwicket
shorter one, he gets up and across and pushes to cover for one
slower ball, 127ks, angles across Johnson, who leaves
simple dismissal, Johnson driving on the up, front foot not to the pitch, and straight into the hands of Uthappa at cover
back of a length, swinging away, 134ks, Bracken pulls out of the shot
there's a fuller one, getting Bracken deep in the crease, defending
back of a length, middle and leg, played back to the bowler
bit too wide, allowing Hussey to drive a single towards extra cover
bounces him, gets him side-on, he weaves out of the way
slower ball off a length and Bracken, initially playing, holds back the bat
similar delivery, just a tad fuller, and again Bracken pulls back the bat

edged and dropped! Bracken gets bat on this one and the result is a thick outside edge that flies to Dhoni but, initially moving the other way, he fails to hold on ... wasn't the easiest take as it was dipping on him and he stuck out his right hand but it didn't stick, perhaps he picked it late
drives a fullish delivery towards mid-off and sets off
back of a length outside off, he gets forward and defends
this time he connects well, driving a full delivery into the covers for one
back of a length, angling away, Hussey uses his feet and squirts this one towards Rohit at backward point
all over for Bracken, trying to do downtown but only chipping a simple catch to Tendulkar at mid-on, and Australia are nine down
thats crucial runs, as Sreesanth drifts onto the pads and Hussey, ever so gently, gets bat on it to beat Dhoni down the leg side
thats that, as Clark drives from his crease and edges to Dhoni, giving Ishant his fourth wicket ... Clark stands his ground and looks at his feet but the umpire has no doubts about that one

inn2.comm: good length outside off stump, shaping away, and Sehwag leaves be
likes the length and flashes hard, very hard, at the outswinger and gets four off the outside edge that flies through the vacant third slip
thats good shape away from the right-hander, at 148ks, and Sehwag holds back the bat just in time
fuller length, scorching down leg stump and there's an inside-edge onto Sehwag's back leg as he drives from the crease
goes for a booming drive with no footwork, to a wide one, and misses
full, very full down leg stump, 150ks, no bat involved and thats wide
dangerous leave, Sehwag not covering off stump as the ball goes on
thats a low full toss and not timed as he'd have liked, but he pushes down towards mid-off for a single
pitches outside leg stump and he turns it out to Lee at deep fine leg
back of a length, going across Tendulkar, who covers off and leaves
firm stroke, a punchy cover-drive off the front foot between Symonds and Clarke as Tendulkar creates room and goes for it on the up

edged and he doesn't get there! Ponting only has one slip in place, oddly, and Hayden cannot clutch onto the flashed outside-edge even as he dives to his right, he didn't get fingers on it so it wont count as a dropped catch
back of a length outside off, Sehwag leaves it be
pace and bounce, drawing an edge from the shoulder of a surprised Tendulkar's bat and flies wide of third slip
back of a length, 149ks, jags in and he defends off the toes
strays onto leg stump, Sehwag nudges it into the gap at midwicket for two
thats well bowled, the yorker down leg stump at 149ks and Sehwag makes sure to lift his front leg before jamming bat down in time
now its a short one into the ribs, the ball lodges between Sehwag's underarm and hips before rolling down near his feet
short one outside off now, very pacy delivery and Sehwag sways back
full on off stump, 134ks, an inside-edged drive gets him one to square leg, raising Tendulkar's 1000th run in Australia
good length on off stump, 133ks, firmly pushed to extra cover
back of a length, seaming across him and he pulls out of the shot

quicker ball, coming back in a bit and rapping him high on the knee roll as he pushes forward, Bracken asks the question but Taufel shakes his head ... it was a good ball, shaping back in but height was the factor
bit fuller and he drives, with plenty of bottom hand, to mid-off

this time the umpire gives it! Bracken produces the same sort of delivery, getting just that little bit more purchase off the surface, and Sehwag takes it high on the front pad again and Taufel agrees with that one, though replays indicate it was going over middle stump
short of a length into the ribs, he hops and turns it towards square leg
sees width and commits himself to an expansive drive outside off stump, just picking the gap at cover and the ball raises away, was in the air but safe
shot of the day, without a doubt! Lee steams in and bowls a good length but Tendulkar greets it with the firmest of straight drives, smashes back for four
back of a length, good lift, but he's right back and across in defence
ah, class! Looking for the yorker, Lee overpitches and Tendulkar punches a straight drive the other side of the stumps for four, cuing hysteria at the MCG
changes the length and almost sneaks through his backward defence
full outside off stump, comes back in and he leaves
good length on middle and leg, inside-edged back onto his pads
back of a length and angling in, he gets in line and defends
back of a length outside off, he gets back, opens the face and gets off the mark
good length on middle and leg, he gets back and turns it away
comes forward to a full one and steers it through the gap at cover and point
back of a length outside off, sits up and he gets tall to drop at his feet
short into the ribs, Pathan tucks it to the onside and responds to Tendulkar's call for an urgent single, running well to the other end
pulls a short one from outside off stump, connecting poorly but the placement is good, getting it over mid-on and it drops in no man's land ... Pathan just makes his ground coming back for three
short on leg stump, he does well to turn it towards square leg
thats a loose walking shot, outside off stump, but he cant handle the pace and gets beaten all ends up
short of a length outside off, 137ks, he gets up and defends to point
good length just outside off stump, he gets forward and pushes to cover
overpitched outside off stump, thats a mistimed drive to extra cover
touch shot, riding the bounce and angling the bat to produce one past gully

short and wide, Pathan slashes up and over the slips, it bounces once in front of third man and then in a flash Lee comes screaming across like the Roadrunner, getting a hand on it but thats four.. but what an effort!
thats a better shot, Pathan cutting late through a diving point for one
short of a length, crunched into the covers where Ponting pulls of a stop
good length outside off stump, Pathan drives elegantly to extra cover
back of a length on off stump, the bat comes down late and he plays to point
lovely shot, a firm drive on the up through cover and point and while Haddin and Symonds pull it in with superb fielding the batsman run four
slower ball, full outside off stump and he pushes to Haddin point
short of a length on middle stump, he gets across and tucks to leg
thats a pull shot, Pathan latching on to a short one from outside off stump and picking up three as the ball slows up near the deep midwicket ropes
good length outside off stump, he meets it with a push to point
short of a length on off stump, movement in from 138ks and Pathan gets in line to tap it back to Bracken
good length this time, 134.7ks, he stops on the shot to cover
full outside off stump, poked out to Clarke at point on the bounce
back of a length, 132ks, jags back in and he runs it wide of Clarke
back of a length and he crunches it towards Clarke's left this time
loosener, 128ks, on a length outside off and Pathan leaves it be
he reaches out and drives a length delivery to Symonds at extra cover
straighter one, 128.6ks, Pathan gets behind it and defends
good delivery, not giving him any width and he again plays back to Clark
well-timed back-foot drive to a fractionally shorter delivery, placing it to the right of Symonds at extra cover, who dives and saves runs

oh ho ho! Tendulkar charges down the track, swings across the line, there's a bit of noise on that, Gilchrist takes it and they all ask the question but its that man  Rudi Koerzten who's unmoved ... sounded like plenty of bat to me ... I'll confirm when I see replays
pitches too straight and Pathan clips it through midwicket for two
trapped him! Johnson swings one back into a rooted Pathan, the ball slides down and hits him in front of about leg stump and Taufel shoots up the finger with little hesitation
pace and bounce outside off stump, 144ks and Gambhir leaves
much fuller, 145ks and curling back into off stump as he leaves
back of a length outside off, 146.4ks, again he confidently leaves
similar channel and Gambhir coolly shoulders arms again
back of a length outside off, no real pace, Tendulkar sizes it up and leaves
decides to flick across the line and does so, but its in the air for a while and lands between square leg and midwicket
bit of seam movement, the ball moving in off a length and Tendulkar adjusts to open the face and run it down towards gully

sees some width and intentionally opens the face, playing it late and wristily working it through where first slip would have been, some good diving and sliding at third man from Johnson restricts him to two
just too straight and he rolls the wrists, picking the gap at square leg
good length outside off, he comes forward and drives to point
sharp delivery gets Gambhir in a tangle, as he tries to leave again but the ball rises and hits bat, almost dropping on to off stump
first shot he's played, and its decent, a flowing square-drive backward of point and he and Tendulkar hustle for another all-run four at this huge MCG
back of a good length into middle and leg, defended to midwicket
short one now and Gambhir, a little man, rides the bounce to keep it down
short again, sliding into his ribs at 143ks and theres a fine inside-edge as the ball proceeds to roll down his thigh pad
much fuller and Gambhir knows where his off stump is, shouldering arms
a frustrated Tendulkar dances down and chases a short-of-a-length delivery outside off stump, failing to connect ... where's he going?
shorter one, sits up and he inside-edges onto his boot, calling for one to point
135ks, Clark's quickest today, and Gambhir leaves it be outside off
holds back the pace and pitches wider, the extra bounce and sharp seam position beats Gambhir as he flirts from the crease
short of a length again, good purchase off the pitch, again he leaves be
works it across Gambhir once more and he's comfortable just leaving
gets some width and he cuts to third man, running hard for the second
thats worked across him and he reaches out, connecting with air
short one, he gets up and cuts to a diving Haddin at point, and just makes his ground at the nonstriker's end after the fielder recovers quickly
down leg stump, 146ks, tucked into the gap at square leg
slower ball, 129ks, overpitched on off and he drives hard to mid-on
pokes a length delivery to Haddin at point and looks on as Gambhir scurries down and has to hurry back to his crease ... had Haddin hit, it would've been interesting
back-of-a-length stuff outside off and Gambhir feels like leaving that one be
slower one, 123ks, Gambhir pushes back to the left of the stumps and judges the single well
good length and it seams into Tendulkar, who calmly guides it wide of backward point for another easy single
back of a length, 130ks, he gets across to off and leaves it be
there's a moment of aggression, mistimed though it was, as Gambhir dances down and swings the bat at a wide one, edging over the slips and gully
short of a length outside off stump, pushes it to point and yells 'NO!'
makes room for himself and drives through cover-point for one
that one nips back in off the seam and Gambhir tucks to square leg for one
short on the stumps, 147ks, he gets across and taps to midwicket
thats short and going well away from him and he flays the bat at it, missing by about a country mile
thats a more patient approach, simply tucking one off the pads to leg
well bowled, well played, well run! Gambhir negates a 143ks attempted yorker by jamming it to Haddin at point and then responds to Tendulkar's call
short of a length outside off, he pokes it straight to Hayden at gully
short and wide and crashed right to Ponting doing the fielding at point
hops up and runs a shortish one to Hayden at gully, on the bounce
steers another short one to a sliding Clarke at point, who stops well
back of a length just outside off, stays low and Gambhir pokes to point
back of a length outside off and he calmly leaves it be
well negotiated by Tendulkar, riding the bounce and steering past gully
back of a length on the stumps, Gambhir turns it to midwicket
top shot, Gambhir getting back and cracking a short one backward of point ... they run two but Gambhir was one short at the crease
back of a length and he waits on it, playing it along the ground to point
fuller one on off stump and he drives with an inside-edge to square leg
fuller in length, very quick, and Tendulkar plays some sort of open-faced steer from the crease but cannot get bat on ball ... that was close
good length outside off the off stump, he dances down and drives to extra cover
short and wide, he chases it but misses the cut, Gilchrist takes standing right up to the stumps
back of a length outside off, he again goes for a shot but misses
jags back off a length and he plays it in towards the midriff
good length outside off stump, played to the fielder in the circle
uses his feet and drives a fuller one towards extra cover
short on off stump, 149.7ks, gets him hopping in defence
fuller ball on off stump, he gets across and defends to cover
short of a length just outside off, 145ks, chopped to point
short again and he edges it towards the vacant slip position this time
short of a length on off stump, he pushes with soft hands and calls for one
and he gets the breakthrough! Pace and bounce does Gambhir in as Lee gets one to climb on Gambhir, the ball takes the shoulder of the bat and Clarke accepts the simplest catch at backward point
misses that one as he walks down the track with a booming off-drive, the extra bounce undid him on that occasion
tight delivery on off stump and he defends watchfully to the off-side
a fraction too wide and he taps it between cover and point for a single
good length on off stump and Yuvraj defends his first ball to point
short of a good length and he punches off the back foot to Hussey at cover
fuller delivery, straightening and he defends to the man at gully
pins him to his crease and draws a leaden-footed push, beating the bat
shuffles in his crease and tucks a short one to square leg
short of a length on off stump, he negates it and defends to point
back of a length outside off stump, he gets back in his crease and defends
attempted yorker ends up too full and he clips out to Haddin in the deep
just a touch too full outside off stump and Yuvraj drives to extra cover
short of a length and he pushes out to Haddin at deep point this time
short of a length on off stump, 129ks, defended off the back foot
looks to shoulder arms but the ball clips his thigh pad and flies to gully
back of a length again, good line to an out-of-form Yuvraj, who defends
now he opens his account, turning one to midwicket and scampering on
this one stops on him but he rolls the wrists, working to midwicket
chases a wide one, on bended knee, but cannot beat point
this time he drives a little straighter and picks out the man at cover
gets back and steers it down to third man
soft dismissal! Tendulkar gets up and drives a good-length delivery in the air to mid-off, where Lee times his dive to his left well and plucks the catch
gets off the mark in streaky manner, pushing into the covers and setting off, and he just manages to get to the other end
back of a length on off stump, Yuvraj gets across and defends
short of a length on off stump, Rohit gets tall and defends near his feet
this time he tucks one off his pads through square leg for a single
back of a length and he defends it to backward point, just wide of the fielder
gets up and runs a good-length delivery to the man at gully
this one nips up and Rohit survives with an inside-edge onto his foot
back of a length, tidy delivery and Rohit defends to point to end the over
hits a length and Yuvraj defends off the back foot with an inside-edge
fuller one, coming in with the arm and its turned wide of square leg
works one across Rohit, off a short length, and the edge falls short of Hayden at second slip, as the batsmen feels for it from the crease
nips this one back in from off stump, and its defended to Clarke at point
slower ball, 126ks on off stump, played back down the track
thats a loose drive to one pitched much fuller, Rohit not getting to the pitch, the ball runs to third man
easy runs, and he nudges off the pads through square leg
back of a length outside off stump, 130ks, off the back foot to point
he's gone! Yuvraj tries to force the pace but doesn't pick the slower ball from Clark, driving hard in the air to the man positioned at short cover the ball before
full on middle and off, he comes forward and plays it to midwicket
on the money and lifting, Dhoni tries to leave but the ball rises on him and he misjudges it, it clips his thigh pad and rolls to gully
full on middle and off, watchfully defended to the man at midwicket
loose, expansive drive ... its all right as he bends his knee and plays a good-looking shot ... except he's very late and makes no contact
short of a length, worked across him and this time he shoulders arms
lovely seam position, angling it across Rohit who plays and misses
fuller outside off stump, he comes forward and square-drives to point
and again he goes driving outside off stump but misses the angled delivery
now he slips in a shorter, faster delivery that gets him back and then raps him on the knuckles
good length delivery on middle and leg, Dhoni drives to midwicket
short of a length outside off stump, Dhoni makes sure to get across and cover his base before reading the length and dropping his hands
full and very wide down leg stump, Gilchrist dives and stops it very well
back of a length outside off stump, Dhoni gets onto the front foot and leaves
top delivery, sneaking past the outside edge of Dhoni's bat as he pushes forward off the front foot, there's some reverse-swing on view from Lee
slower ball, on a good length, Dhoni holds bat behind pad and leaves
attempted yorker's a full toss and Dhoni gets off the mark, turning it into the midwicket region for a sharp sinle
pushes it across Dhoni, who feels for it and misses once again
a touch straighter and he presents a full face, driving to mid-off
quicker one, 140ks, swings wide as Dhoni leaves it be
this time he pushes at it and gets an edge that doesn't carry to first slip, Hayden fumbles to his right and Dhoni takes a single
jabs at one angling away again and the ball falls short of second slip this time, as Ponting stops it to his left
sees extra width and drives at it, edging through the gap at gully
good delivery, hitting a length and going on, beating his forward prod
back of a length outside off stump and thats a good leave from Rohit
stays in his crease and plays away from his body, steering it to point
skips down and edges a wide one down to Johnson at third man
better application from Dhoni, pushing forward to a length delivery and taking a quick single into the covers, well run by Rohit too
another single comes India's way as Rohit pushes a shorter one from the crease, with soft hands, and picks up one towards point
tossed up on off stump, Rohit gets onto the front foot and defends
flatter one and thats a nice little off-drive to mid-off, who's deep
short and too flat and Dhoni flat-bats it to extra cover, but I suspect he was eying midwicket or mid-on
flat outside off stump, he gets forward and drives to Clarke's left
quicker one on middle and leg, turned to midwicket this time
flat still, tidy bowling, Dhoni gets across and defends back to Clarke
good length outside off stump, Rohit comes forward and runs it to gully
slightly fuller in length and he drives on the up to extra cover
covers off stump and gets down to guide it through the gap at gully
whats this? Dhoni shuffles across to outside off, trying to do something different, and ends up steering the ball to backward point as Bracken sees him and holds back the length
bowls it on a fuller length and Dhoni plays a more orthodox drive to mid-off
slower ball ends up a touch short and he reaches out to dab past gully
keeps it flat on off stump, Rohit drives to Symonds at extra cover
this one's speared down the pads and he tucks to square leg
touch quicker, 90ks, middle and off, pushed to point
uses his feet and drives to Clarke's right, he dives but can't stop the single
makes room to leg and drives to extra cover, sets off and sees mid-off scurry in so sends Dhoni back, and he has to hurry to make his ground ... India don't need such urgency
slides well down leg stump, Rohit doesn't connect with the sweep and Clarke and Gilchrist appeal vehemently but an ice-cool Taufel shakes his head
play and a miss from the crease as Dhoni flirts with a back-of-a-length delivery, with a slip in place and Gilchrist standing up
a touch fuller but still angled across him and this time he leaves it
tight line this, Dhoni leaves again and thats well taken by Gilchrist
a touch fuller, Dhoni comes forward and pushes to Clarke at point
thats pushed across too far outside off stump and wide is the call
walks across his stump and flicks to deep backward square, hustles for two and does very well to come back for the second, he was pumping, was Dhoni
back of a length outside off and he calmly leaves the last ball of the over
thats risky business, exposing the stumps as he tries to cut and just managing to get bat on ball in time, squirting it to the right of backward point
walks right across the stumps again, getting outside the line, and tries to paddle it but mistimes the shot to square leg
flat and a touch short, Rohit gets tall and drives to cover, who's a bit deep
another easy single as Dhoni pulls a short one out to deep midwicket
a bit slower and fuller and Rohit clips back past Clarke for a single
another two knocked off, as Dhoni flicks one from leg stump out past midwicket and once again urges his young partner to come back for two
takes the aerial route, slashing up and over point for two out to the deep
gets some width and at that pace he can easily reach out and steer it wide of Hayden at slip and down towards Johnson doing duty at third man
hits a fuller length and Dhoni comes onto the front foot, pushing to cover
thats a better length, on middle and off, and Dhoni has to defend it back
once again, a tidy line and length and Dhoni pats it back down the track
a touch fuller, getting Dhoni pushing off the front foot to point
back of a length on middle and off, defended to point and he sets off, Clarke swoops in and bangs in a direct hit but Dhoni's home safely
moves across off stump before the ball is released, tucking out past square leg, he hustles hard but sends Rohit back, he then slips and just makes it back
back of a length on the stumps, he gets behind the ball and defends
slower ball, 126ks, hint of movement through the air and he defends
thats outside leg stump he tucks it towards an athletic Lee at midwicket
pitches wide and beyond the stumps and Taufel spreads his wings
similar delivery, pitching very full but this time there's no reaction from Taufel
back of a length outside off, he gets across and drops it to square leg
similar delivery forces him back, again turning to square leg
offered some width, he plays it late, dropping the wrists and cutting to third man for an easy single
good length, comes in from off stump and he defends to point
thats through, as Dhoni flashes one in the air between two point fielders and runs an easy couple as sweeper does the fielding
fuller just outside off stump, he drives off the front foot to point
full and flat on off stump, he drives back to the bowler's right
first boundary in 21 overs, as he goes down town, striking it hard and to the right of Symonds and also over mid-on
sweeps one from leg stump out to deep fine leg
slower ball, 74ks on off stump, defended back to mid-on
reaches out and drives a flat one into the covers
uses his feet nicely, clipping wide of midwicket with little hassle
short outside leg stump, he works it off the hips to square leg
a bit wide and he goes for the cut, nearly chopping onto his stumps, in the end its an easy single as the ball runs wide of Gilchrist
back of a length outside off stump, he gets up and shoulders arms
pitches full outside leg stump, Dhoni misses out on the flick but Johnson runs in to cut off the single, as there was nobody at square leg
pushed across him off a fuller length, he covers off stump and leaves
back of a length, he gets across and pokes it to point
tossed up outside off stump, he waits for the spin and plays to point
flatter on off stump, uses his feet and drives it back to Symonds
flat again, off stump, and he plays it back to Symonds again
thats the 150 as Rohit gives himself room, dancing down and going inside-out over extra cover but the ball stops up in the deep
slides down the  pads and he eases that into the corner for one
good shot, as he stands and again drives on the up, this time along the ground and wide of extra cover and mid-off to end a good over
flat on middle and off, played back to the bowler
tossed up on middle and off this time, but he plays it back again
tossed up a touch wider, inviting the drive, but he leaves it be
flatter and shorter, he impatiently gets back and thumps it to cover
flat again outside off stump and he plays towards point
flat on the stumps, this time he uses his feet and nudges into the gap
tossed up on off stump, Dhoni works it across the line and Symonds fields
much flatter now, he still walks across the stumps and drives it back
flat and quick on middle and off, he shuffles and drives to mid-on
no room to work with so Rohit drives it back to Symonds' left
and the scores are level as he pulls a short one to deep midwicket
thats a wide one, very short down leg stump, and the MCG erupts as India win game four of the CB Series by five wickets!
